def: To play the pedant; to use pedantic expressions. [R.]
The morbid phenomena produced by dwelling among marshes;malarial disease or disposition.
To diminish the quantity of; to lessen. [Obs.] Shak.
Of or pertaining to Polynesia (the islands of the eastern andcentral Pacific), or to the Polynesians.
The person to whom a lease is given, or who takes an estate bylease. Blackstone.
In the manner of an accessory; auxiliary.
The property possessed by some substances of crystallizing inclosely similar forms while unlike in chemical composition.
